files.patch:
@@ -26,1 +26,1 @@ - * @bug 6251738 8226279 8297802 8296546 + * @bug 6251738 8226279 8297802 8296546 8305407 @@ -418,0 +418,45 @@ + @Test + public void testDifferentWhitespaceTitlesForURL(Path base) throws IOException { + Path src = base.resolve("src"); + tb.writeJavaFiles(src, """ + package p; + /** Class C. */ + public class C { + private C() { } + + /** + * Method m1. + * @spec http://example.com/index.html abc def + */ + public void m1() { } + + /** + * Method m2. + * @spec http://example.com/index.html abc def + */ + public void m2() { } + } + """); + + javadoc("-d", base.resolve("out").toString(), + "--source-path", src.toString(), + "p"); + checkExit(Exit.OK); + + checkOutput(Output.OUT, false, "error"); + + checkOutput("external-specs.html", true, + """ +
+
Specification
+
Referenced In
+
abc def
+
+
    +
  • p.C.m1()
    • +
  • p.C.m2()
    • +
+
+
"""); + } +
